categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Sticky Fingers," also known as Pickpocket 8, was a Rybet thief who was a member of the Razzi Syndicate, led by Latts Razzi. At some point by 10 BBY, Sticky-Fingers stole the Smuggler's Guide from Lando Calrissian after the Esoomian brawler Bumblethunk beat up Calrissian.
